程序包 cn.edu.whut.sept.zuul.Items

类 Items

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.edu.whut.sept.zuul.Items.Items
  • public class Items
extends java.lang.Object
    The Items class represents a collection of items.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      Items()
      Constructs an empty Items object.
      Items​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Item> items)
      Constructs an Items object with the specified items.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void addItem​(java.lang.String name, Item item)
      Adds an item to the collection.
      void deleteItem​(java.lang.String name)
      Deletes an item from the collection.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Item> getItems()
      Returns the HashMap of items.
      Item getItemsByName​(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the item with the specified name.
      void showAllItems()
      Displays all the items in the collection.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Items

        public Items()
        Constructs an empty Items object.

      • Items

        public Items​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Item> items)
        Constructs an Items object with the specified items.
        参数:
        items - The items to initialize the collection with.

    • 方法详细资料

      • showAllItems

        public void showAllItems()
        Displays all the items in the collection. If there are no items, it prints a message indicating that the place has no items.

      • getItems

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Item> getItems()
        Returns the HashMap of items.
        返回:
        The HashMap of items.

      • getItemsByName

        public Item getItemsByName​(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the item with the specified name.
        参数:
        name - The name of the item.
        返回:
        The item with the specified name, or null if not found.

      • addItem

        public void addItem​(java.lang.String name,
                    Item item)
        Adds an item to the collection.
        参数:
        name - The name of the item.
        item - The item to add.

      • deleteItem

        public void deleteItem​(java.lang.String name)
        Deletes an item from the collection.
        参数:
        name - The name of the item to delete.
